snippet: An American missionary in his 70s who had moved to Haiti in the wake of the 2010 earthquake was stabbed to death in Port-au-Prince, the capital, the police and friends said Friday.
abstract: George Knoop, American missionary who moved to Haiti in wake of 2010 earthquake, is stabbed to death in Port-au-Prince.
lead_paragraph: An American missionary in his 70s who had moved to Haiti in the wake of the 2010 earthquake was stabbed to death in Port-au-Prince, the capital, the police and friends said Friday.
